item.guid: Commonwealth of Pennsylvania-Registered Nurse Southeast Youth Development Center, Montgomery County-PA, US
item.description:
📍 Location: PA, US 💼 Type: Fulltime 🏠 Work: On-site 💰 Salary: USD 92,052 - 109,766 (yearly)
📝 Description: **THE POSITION** ----------------
The Department of Human Services, Bureau of Juvenile Justice Services, Southeast Youth Development Center (SYDC) provides dedicated, high\\-quality care to at\\-risk youth residents.
